content: 3-4 p2 k2 repeat all the way around rnds 5-6 k1 p2 k2 repeat to the last 3 sts p2 k1 rnds 7-8 k2 p2 repeat all the way around you are back at the beginning of the pattern repeat rounds 1-8 until your desired length i did 40 rounds toe round 1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of front needle k2tog k1 now you will be working on the back needle k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of back needle k2tog k1 round 2 knit all the way around repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 12 sts left and there are 6 sts on the front needle and 6 sts on the back needle graft toes using kitchener stitch your amazing you just knitted baby socks and that s awesome i hope you get so much joy out of this pair of socks and will be able to knit up many thank you for using my pattern find me on instagram heidis crafting corner i filmed a video to go along with this pattern you can find it at my youtube channel find me on youtube at thank you www youtube com/@heidiscraftingcorner please do not distribute copy or re-sell this pattern not to be included in any collection or used for profit thank you for understanding
